resources.string: So then it is not of him that willeth, nor of him that runneth, but of God that sheweth mercy. Rom 9:16
Wishing myself a productive and successful new year. As I blow the candles on my cake, may all the looming sadness and negativity be blown away.
Thank God another has passed with me in this world- I’m so awesome it’s a real blessing to everyone in my life to have me here. Happy birthday to me
A whole year has passed and it has been 365 days of pure blessings, love, and care! Happy Birthday to me!
As I turn a year older today, I am most thankful to God Almighty and the people around me
